General.Name: QMC Quantum Minerals Corp
General.Description: QMC Quantum Minerals Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, evaluation, exploration, and development of resource properties in Canada. The company explores for lithium, copper, nickel, gold, silver, palladium, platinum, and zinc deposits. Its flagship project is the Irgon Lithium Mine property that consists of 22 mineral claims covering an area of approximately 11,325 acres located in Manitoba, Canada. QMC Quantum Minerals Corp. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 755 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1X6
